alert.note: Alert for Fulton (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued May 13 at 7:17PM CDT until May 13 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Fulton County in west central Illinois... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 716 PM CDT, emergency management reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to three inches of rain have already fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Avon and surrounding areas. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
